text: Ezɨ Abraham bizir a mɨdorozimɨn iniziba, a bar a da tuirazɨ, da 10plan pozibar otifi, ezɨ a pozir mam isa Melkisedek ganɨngi. (Ia nɨghnɨgh, Melkisedeghɨn ziamɨn mɨngarim a kamakɨn, Arazir Aghuibar Atrivim. Egha a uaghan Salemɨn atrivim, ezɨ an ziar kamɨn mɨngarim kamakɨn, Navir Amɨrizimɨn Atrivim.)
